Name: Isabelle
Math Notation Descriptions: Isabelle uses LaTeX math commands to represent math notation. This is strong supported within the IDE

Name: Agda
Math Notation Descriptions: Agda has support for unicode characters. And uses unicode characters in its math library. This often requires special editor integrations to input the unicode characters.

Name: Lean
Math Notation Descriptions: Lean has allows representing math notation on LaTeX.
Contributors: Leo de Moura, Sebastian Ullrich, Dany Fabian

Name: LEO-II
Contributors: C. Benzmuller, F. Theiss, N. Sultana

Name: Z/EVES
Math Notation Descriptions: Z/EVES uses LaTeX commands to prove propositions
